Row.Text: We're building the future in here Compañero. I am Salvador Allende, representative of the people of Chile.
Welcome to the Nation of Chile. I am Salvador Allende, representative of the will of the working people of this country.
These are my last words. But I have the certainty that my sacrifice shall not be in vain. I know that my defeat will be a moral lesson that will castigate felony, cowardy and treason.

Workers of my Nation! I have faith in Chile and its destiny. Soon shall we overcome this dark day and the day when people will be able to walk freely once again through peaceful avenues. As for now... Long Live Chile! Long live the People. Long live the Workers!
Placed in a historic transition, I will pay for my loyalty to the people with my life.
You really go crazy with all these button things.
This is utterly unacceptable for the people of Chile.
This won't cut it with the necessecities we have right now.
Are you trying to take advantage of the people of Chile?
Forgot your documents?
Do you want a tea now?
We've both made our intentions very clear. Why do you keep coming back?
I should stop serving wine on meetings
Oh, do you like wine? I've got an excellent Cabernet Sauvignon around here...
I know you come with good news!
Compañero!
Always glad to see a friend!
Welcome Compañero, what can I do to help you?
This room sure leaves an impression, eh?
Don't mind the computers, What would you like to discuss?
Hope the people of your nation are doing well
Oh those reports just came in, but come in, I'll take care of them later.
What have you done for your people recently?
Have you come to take advantage of our humble nation?
The people must not sacrifice themselves! Let us make peace.
I cannot bear to see this nation burn... let's end this war.
Violence is not the solution to our problems!
We've got the right to live in peace!
Please. We must overcome this dark and bitter moment.
The people united will never be defeated!
Underestimated the power of the people, did you?
Chileans, never mess with chileans.
Oh, I know conspirators and wannabe coupers all too well...
I'm glad we can go through this historic transition together.
We shall triumph my friend. We shall overcome.
This is most detestable bussiness. But if it means the downfall of {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} I'm glad we're going at it together.
Soon {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} shall stop tarnishing the values of our nations.
Violence is not the only way, you know.
I know the armed way may sometimes look necessary, but please, reconsider your ways.
I fully trust my generals if war times are to come. Just so you may know...
The press has talked about saber rattling over our border. Anything to say about that?
I shall not tolerate such imperialistic policies as yours. Keep your land grabbing at bay.
I've heard of some border incidents with your people. I hope that these won't amount to anything. What would you like to discuss?
The land of the People of Chile is not for sale. I shall not tolerate such violent irruption into the lands of my people.
We're going through a sort of agrarian reform in my territory. Could you please not take advantage of my people while doing so?
Though I do not support these ideals myself. I can understand the power a strong military, as long as it protects the people. I commend your efforths.
Oh, while you're here. May I ask some economic advice from your nation? My advisors aren't quite... reliable.
Don't worry, I don't look down on... smaller nations
Listen, I can understand wanting to cut down on the army, I've personally had my problems with it. But you have to bear in mind, the military is there for a reason...
Your imperialistic tendencies are a threat to the entire world.
If it were by me, I'd gladly accept your friendship. However I represent the will of all the people of this nation, and at this moment, it isn't in our best interests to do so.
We're still not sure the intentions of your civilization being compatible with this project of ours, so as of now, I must decline.
The people of Chile haven't yet made a good image of your country, try later.

Compañero! Glad to see you. I fear this is not the best moment for this nation, for {1_CivName} has been conspiring for my downfall and that of everything we've built, could you do a Denounciation towards them as a token of support towards our cause?

I should have suspected as much. I shall make it known that you too conspire against our Cyberbolivarian Transition.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

So it is then? No one's to be trusted these days, I shall tell the world of how you're too seeking the downfall of a nation as peaceful as mine.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

I've heard terrible rumours and everything is pointing out for them to be true. You have been conspiring against my project since the very beginning, and I shall let the world know of your treachery.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
You're not a friend of the people's government and our peaceful resolve.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Well, I'm not friends to everyone, I know my project may seem a little bit unorthodox, but history shall prove me right.
At least I have my people's support.
Ahhh, I've noticed that you've become friends with {1_CivName}. Glad to hear of it. I'm already on good terms with them myself.
I've had many altercates with {1_CivName} in the past. I just say... they may not be who they claim to be.
Both {1_CivName} and I are working towards similar goals. How much of a surprise it is that you're against that.
Glad to hear there are others in the world which share my disgust with {1_CivName}. They are clearly not to be trusted.
Being on such good terms, I couldn't help but notice that you'd become friends with {1_CivName}. Our cooperation truly shall leave a message to the world at large.
I share your convictions that {1_CivName} only causes problems for the civilized nations of the world. Perhaps the combination of our denouncements will teach them a lesson.
You made a Declaration of Friendship with {1_CivName}? I should have suspected as much.
Anyone who you don't get along with is clearly worth building a friendship with. Give {1_CivName} my regards.
I see you sabre-rattling near our borders. The people of Chile shall not cower from war, if it comes to happen.
It's come to my attention that you have a large number of Units near my borders. I request that you move them elsewhere to avoid causing undue distress to my citizens.
Your wanton violence towards {@1_MinorCivName} is an horrible display of absolute disregard for human life.
{@1_MinorCivName} is a nation that needs and has our protection. Neither my people nor I shall tolerate this.
Your expansion efforts are an insult. Know that there will be consequences for this.
I couldn't help but notice that you seem to be expanding into lands which I regard to be mine. I request that you reconsider this.
Your habit of claiming every bit of land you've spotted has not gone unnoticed. I advise you to discontinue this.
If you should continue to expand your empire in lands I feel are mine it can only ruin the possibility of friendship between us.
The settling of your people near my sovereign territory is placing a strain upon relations between our two nations.
Your guarantee of not expanding near us seems to have been empty words. Know that there will be consequences for this.
The aggressive manner in which you buy up territory near us is an insult. I had hoped you would be a better neighbor.
Your purchase of land in my vicinity has caused some alarm. I caution you so that this issue does not become more serious.
So it seems you lied when you told us that your empire would stop purchasing land near us. I do not take this insult lightly.
I am very disappointed that you did not stop funding land acquisition near my territory. I had hoped you were a more honorable leader.
It is hard to find worthy friends in this world. I'd like to forge a Pact of Cooperation with your great empire. What do you say?
Great leader, would you care to enter a Pact of Cooperation? My hope is that we can build a long-lasting bond between our two empires.
Let us plant the seeds of a bright future by forming a Pact of Cooperation. What say you?
This world can be cruel. Only with the assistance of others can we overcome it. Shall we join in a Pact of Cooperation?
It is hard to find worthy friends in this world. I'd like to make a public Declaration of Friendship, informing the other empires of the bond between our peoples. What do you say?
Great leader, would you care to make a Declaration of Friendship to the world? My hope is that we can build a long-lasting bond between our two empires.
Let us plant the seeds of a bright future by making a Declaration of Friendship to the world. What say you?
This world can be cruel. Only with the assistance of others can we overcome it. Shall we announce to the world our Declaration of Friendship?
So, then, we were fated to be enemies all along.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Your treachery is unbounded. The world will know of what you have done.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
{1_PlayerName:textkey} has brought immeasurable suffering to this earth. For the sake of everything that's still good in this Earth. I fear we must cooperate to bring down his regime.
I fear the time has come for this ugly bussiness, let's... let's just start war against {1_PlayerName:textkey}.
Your actions are unforgivable. There can never be reconciliation between our two nations.
Your actions betray your words. I should have known as much sooner. I've been a fool. Consider the relations between our two civilizations over.
I wanted to make it known to you that I value our friendship, and hope that it might remain strong.
I'm glad to know I can count on your support during these uncertain times.
We may not always agree, but I really trust your guidance as an example to my own government.
I this really your regard to the people of the world? Invading and conquering with no care for those caught in the middle? Please, reconsider this.
Your threatening the entire world by getting yourself involved in wars that are none of your bussiness.
I shouldn't tolerate such people in my lands. But I do because I care. Amend your ways, seek the path of peace
Your intervention in other people's affairs shall be your downfall.
It's come to my attention that you're getting a little friendly with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Trust me, it's not necessary, they are under our protection and we can take care of them just fine.
I've noticed your relationship with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. While that's nice, it would be best that you leave their protection to us. I'd hate for either of us to step on any toes.
You are a tyrant to your people
Take this as personal advice. I know the military may be annoying at times. But whether we like it or not, it's fundamental for the sovereingty of a nation.
Why must you bully those lesser than you? I would do not such thing, myself.
As a person I tell you, you must listen to what your people has to say. You're about to face a revolution.
The size of your nation is quite... quaint.
Travelers have told us that your empire's economy is in pretty sad shape.
What a sad sight... your empire is so uncultured.
Your cultural development is simply sad.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Attacking the City-State will greatly damage relations and may lead to war.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} has taken back its guarantee of protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
We've been over this before. The answer is still no. Do not bring this up again.
I may be gentle, but that doesn't mean I shall give in easily, the answer is still no
Very well. I agree to avoid settling in the vicinity of your empire for the time being. Perhaps in the future you will be a more accommodating neighbor.
So be it. I will not settle near your lands. Cooperation is clearly not one of your strong suits.
Unacceptable. These lands need development and I shall provide it.
You dare insult me in such a manner? I will not forget this.
How dare you? Do you believe me to be weak-willed?
Not a chance. You need to brush up on your diplomacy, my friend.
That will work. May a strong friendship lead to a bright future for us all.
An excellent idea. May our alliance kead to a better living for our people.
I am happy to accept. May the people work freely in cooperation.
I must decline.
Sorry, but no. Perhaps another time.
I fear that such an arrangement is not in my best interests, so I must decline.
As it pains me to admit it, it's the correct choice. I hope I'll be able to forgive me for this.
Though I personally don't agree with it. My advisors tell me it's on the best of my interests. However we're not prepared. Give us 10 turns.
Very well. I do what I must to maintain peace in my lands.
I will do what it takes to keep the peace.
Fine. But know that you poison your reputation with acts such as these. For what that might be worth to you.
Please. You're in no position to make such demands.
You should be well aware of your own inability to back those threats up.
You're not fooling anyone. I have nothing to fear from you.
Haha! I'll assume this transgression just happened because you're not in the best state of mind.
You dare insult me in such a manner? If you want something so badly then do your best to come and take it.
You'll have to take it from my dead body.
If you want that you'll have to come and get it.
Unacceptable.
Don't be a fool.
You ask for too much. I will not drive my nation into poverty to satisfy your greed.
No. I have my dignity, and refuse to hand over such a great bounty so freely.
Your desire to strip my lands of so much wealth is intolerable. Do not ask for so much.
You threaten me again so soon? I refuse your demands, you vile beast.
I think you should enact some reforms in your lands to better your production, rather.
Asking for the fruits of others' labor yet again? Your behavior is too bourgeois. Learn to enjoy the fruits of your own labor.
Always glad to encourage fair trade between equals.
This shall be interesting
I'm willing to pay this, if it means the wellbeing of my people
I'm not a violent man. I think it's time to end this buffonade.
For the sake of our people, of our future. Let's make peace.
I don't like to do this. But you have something we need and I'm willing to take any measures to make sure my people get it.
Unfortunately things aren't going terribly well over here. Can you spare something for a friend? I'll try to return the favor when things are going better for me.
Although it pains me to do so, I must ask for your assistance, friend.
My people are in great need. I beg of you, from person to person, please, help us.
We must let the free man walk freely without fear of borders, do you agree?
Opening our borders to one another can only serve to solidify our friendship.
I would like to negotiate passage through your territory.

I would like to lay plans for establishing a Research Agreement with your great nation. Doing so would require each of us to spend 150 [ICON_GOLD]. What do you think?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Agreeing will not form a Research Agreement yet)
I bet your scientists are desperate for an opportunity to witness the secrets in the computers behind me. Maybe we can reach an agreement?
This deal strengthened our nations and our bonds of friendship. Shall we renew this deal and continue our shared prosperity?
Times change. Necessities and Values get reconsidered. To renew this deal, we would need more from your side of the negotiation.
The people of Chile are in grave need of this resource.
I shall save your people from your ways.
The battle for Chile shall be one to be remembered. Let history know us as a people who fought tooth and claw against oppresion.
Though my armies may be weak, the will of my people is strong and won't be subdued easily.
Destroy me if you can. I can promise you though, history will reivindicate me.
So be it. The people of Chile will give the fight of their lives.
You will forever be known as a villain who preys on the weak.
You mistake my gentle demeanor for weakness. You shall pay for that mistake.
Oh, let me tell you, my advisors really find this an excellent opportunity to prove their word.
I find no joy in these militaristic endeavours. But if it must come to happen. I shall make sure it'll be for the best outcome of my people.
Haha. Well, I won't question your decision, but it appears to me that you've made a big mistake.
Your actions fill me with sadness... There is surely a special place in Hell for those such as you.
You would attack us in such a manner? Your hubris knows no limits. I hope that you will one day be judged for this.
Taking advantage of another's weakness is unnecessary in the pursuit of victory. Surely you know there's a better way?
How could you do such a thing? Begone, you vile being.
I had thought us friends. This is a grave betrayal.
We knew this day would come. Your unjust rule has come to an end.
You have betrayed your word. Make no mistake, the world will know of your treachery.
Your lands is poorly kept and corruptly managed. We shall ammend that. By force.
It is now the moment to begin the true world revolution.
Fate has christened me the one which shall bring unity to this divided planet.
You shall be assimilated.
I'll be honest with you - I intend to destroy you along with everyone else.
You are merely a stepping-stone on my grand ascent to world domination.
Now is the time for my master plan to commence. It is time for you to die like the rest of these fools.
The advantage is mine. I will now destroy you.
I have waited long enough. I have seen an opening in your defense and I will use it to my advantage.
I have been waiting a long time for this day. Now would be a good time to put your affairs in order.
It is now my time. I will defeat you and come one step closer to victory.
My advisors tell me this is the best course of action.
The current situation cannot be ignored. It is now or never.
I cannot ignore this chance to eliminate a potential competitor.
Your weakness presents to me a great opportunity. You have my apologies.
Although the task before me may be impossible, I am compelled to find a way to destroy you and all that you stand for. I will do so or die trying.
It is clear that you are strong. I will, however, find a way to defeat you.
You are a villain without equal. Within every fiber of my being, I know I must destroy you.
Your might is unmatched, but I will find a way to defeat you.
The time to make a stand is now. The odds are not with me, but I find a way to destroy you.
My people are proud and strong and would rather die fighting than under the joke of an oppressor. Odds are not in my favor, but were they ever?
Although I do not wish it, I fear that now may be my only opportunity to defeat you. Let us meet on the battlefield.
Destruction might be the fate which awaits me, but should I back down only eventual defeat awaits anyways.
Although feigning friendship with you wasn't very polite, few who make their mark on history were known for their manners. May your passage be swift.
I couldn't tolerate it anymore. Your people shall be much better under my protection.
I fear your project was anathema to mine. There was no recourse but war. I shall take care of your people, you have my word.
As much as it pains me to. My advisors told me this was the best course of actions. War was necessary and it shall be done. I hope you'll eventually understand.
The odds are clearly not with me, but I fully trust in my generals and the will of my people to get us through the worst in this war.
So be it. My armies will extract it from your lands then.
Then war it is.
What is your offer?
What would you suggest?
What is the price of peace?
Cyberbolivarianism must still be imposed upon you, by force.
This is not the time for negotiation.
We still have business to settle.
So you think you can just declare war on my people and then come back and act like nothing happened? We shall keep fighting. We shall not surrender, not now.
Make it so!
I am grateful that this has ended without violence.
I am pleased to hear this.
That is good to hear.
You have my thanks.
I am grateful that this has ended without violence.
History will long remember your great deeds.
That is a shame.
Perhaps another time then.
That is disappointing.
So be it.
Then you will be responsible for the consequences.
You will regret this.
For freeing those captives, you have my thanks.
I am appreciative for the actions you have taken on behalf of my people.
Thank you. May this be remembered as a historic event which brought our two great empires closer together.
This imperialistic culture you're trying to impose upon us, it's. There's no words to what you're doing.
Are you trying to start a propaganda war against my nation.
Guess it's truth when they say these military folk have this code of honor. We shall meet on the battlefield, regrettably.
In the interest of our peaceful relations, I'll believe you.
That is what I was afraid of.
I only hope that is indeed the case.
It'll make sense in the future.
They were a threat to our project.
I remain confident that my decision was the best for my people and my nation.
It seems that you cannot be reasoned with. What a shame.
I wish you had more carefully considered your response.
I don't appreciate that tone that you're using with me.
You know that this can only sow tension between our two nations.
I thought you might like to know that I've launched an invasion of one of your little pet states. The lands of {@1_MinorCivName} shall trouble the cyberbolivarian revolution no more.
Oops, it seems I've attacked your little friend {@1_MinorCivName}. Care to do something about it?

It's come to my attention that I may have attacked {@1_MinorCivName}, a city-state under your protection. While it was not my goal to be at odds with your empire, this was deemed a necessary course of action.
I've been informed that my empire has commenced an attack on {@1_MinorCivName}. I assure you, this was not on purpose, and hope that this does not serve to drive us apart.
We should consider exchanging embassies, which would allow for more advanced diplomacy between our peoples.
We would like to set up an embassy in your capital. What do you think?
Your bullying of {@1_MinorCivName} is intolerable. I demand that you refrain from squeezing tribute out of city-states under my protection.
I heard about what you did to {@1_MinorCivName}. Did you not realize they are under my protection? Do not provoke me further.
We asked {@1_MinorCivName} for a tribute recently and they gave in. You promised to protect them from such things, but we both know you cannot back that up.
Your little friend {@1_MinorCivName} is so easy to push around. They may have made fun of our nation once, but now they serve our interests quite nicely.
It's come to my attention that I may have bullied {@1_MinorCivName}, which is under your protection. You do not put their needs above mine, I hope.

I've been informed that my armies have taken tribute from {@1_MinorCivName}, a city-state under your protection. I assure you, this was quite unintentional, and I hope that this does not serve to drive us apart.

Warm salutations to you wise leader! I'm pleased to see you also have chosen to follow the path of Freedom. The free world will be stronger with one more nation to help us all fight against oppression!
Greetings comrade! I'm pleased to see you also have chosen to follow the path of Order. Perhaps we can find some opportunities to aid each other during our empires' next 5-Year Plans!
Welcome great emperor! I'm pleased to see you have also chosen to follow the path of Autocracy. May we work together to ensure that only the very strongest nations survive to achieve true greatness!
How desperate are you to try and steal the secrets of our development? We've got nothing to hide, but that doesn't mean we will tolerate stealing!
I am willing to overlook your recent theft of one of my technological secrets with a solemn promise that it won't happen again.
I'm glad you agreed to stop this petty thieving.
And to think I'd called you compañero once.
As you request, our agents will not conduct operations in your territory.
Our agents help keep our civilization safe from all threats, including you. They operate as we need them to, for the wellbeing of our society.
Thank you for bringing this {@1_CivAdjective} plot to our attention. With this warning, we will be ready for whatever they may try. Your generous aid will be remembered.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is plotting against you. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is currently marching an army to sneak attack your city of {2_CityName}. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is currently marching an army your way in a sneak attack. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} embarked an army with naval escorts to sneak attack your city of {2_CityName}. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} embarked an army with naval escorts in a sneak attack against your civilization. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
We killed your spy as it was trying to steal from us. We are always alert for those who seek to undermine the progress of our people, you know.
I regret any confusion caused by our late agent's recent activity. Please let any hostile feelings rest with the deceased operative.
I know why you've come here. I've made some faulty decisions and I'm willing to take the blame for it.
I'm willing to share the vision of the future I'm building for all the people. That does not mean, however, I'm willing to tolerate any theft of our discoveries. Hope I've made this clear.
There's rumours, many rumours, of your agents roaming my lands. This does not bode well for either of us, so I'd suggest to cease any subversive actions you might have planned against my nation.
We have taken notice of the religious conversions you are undertaking inside our empire. Are you trying to undermine my peaceful revolution through religious means?
Fair enough. I'm willing to take the blame
Let us make a moment of silence for he who has fallen, and let's not talk more on the subject.
I'm glad you agreed to end this proselytizing.
Sooner or later you'll learn how intrusive religion can get when it amasses enough power.
As you wish, our missionaries will no longer share the one true faith with the people in your cities.
In spite of your protests, your citizens will continue to be enlightened by our missionaries, even though you damn your own people to live in ignorance.
So, are you ready to capitulate yet and let us leave in peace?
I think we've made clear the people's power. I'm willing to hear your terms.
You really underestimated the power of the people united, didn't you. I'm ready to talk peace talks.
We were very pleased to hear your recent proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. It seems that our goals are aligned.
Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} suits our interests quite nicely. You have our sincere gratitude.
Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} is a blatant displayal of interventionism against the project I'm working on. I shall not tolerate such attacks against the people's government.
I found your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} a subtle attack against my people. Surely there is a better way to resolve our differences than petty politics.
Thanks to the help of your delegates, our recent proposal to the {1_LeagueName} was successful. We look forward to your continued support, and will try to return the favor.
Our proposal to the {1_LeagueName} succeeded, with the support of your delegation. I'm glad to know you support our crazy project.
Your delegation has deliberately undermining chilean efforths during the {1_LeagueName}. I shall not tolerate this.
Our proposal to the {1_LeagueName} was defeated at the hands of your delegates. We shall not support anyone who works against our Cyberbolivarian project.
We thank you for entrusting the World Congress to our capable leadership. I expect great things to come in the {1_LeagueName}.
We'll see about that.
Yes, that's right.
I remain confident that my decision was the best for my people and my nation.
Very well. I'll be monitoring the situation.
We are not willing to offer you enough to make this a fair trade.
I personally believe in fair trade and I fear nothing we can offer would result in such a deal for you.
We've noticed that you've been looking for cultural artifacts within our borders. This needs to stop.
Somebody's got to rescue those precious cultural artifacts.
I see the error on my ways, you're beholden to your own memory as we are to ours.
I can't but feel this is a direct affront to the people of my nation, and myself...
Thank you for respecting the legacy of my people.
Someone shall remember the lower classes of the world. And if you don't...
We only want to rescue the memory of the people, even those not in our lands.
The people of my nation have started clamoring for liberty and saying the government I've built is oppresive. The one I built for the people! Maybe I've finally seen the error of my ways.
Your obsession with order and quiet has permeated my society. Seems like I'll have to enact some changes around here.
So your forcing your ideology on us with your strongarm tactics. Yet, I can see the value of a strong ally. Maybe I should adopt a variant of your ideology after all?
Your people are clamoring for freedom. The revolution must be done through peaceful and democratic means. Freedom is the only way!
The workers, the people of your nation live downtrodden in an unrepresentative state. Order must be imposed in your civilization!
Your people are getting manipulated by imperialistic complots. They need a strong, centralized government to guide them. Autocracy is the way.
We must not sacrifice the liberties and rights we've granted to our citizens. Our revolution can be, must be, enacted through the path of Freedom. Glad you can join me in this journey.
We fight for the revolution of the people compañero! Welcome to the true way of the future comrade, welcome to the Order ideology!

Sometimes hard choices have to be made fellow leader. Freedom and Order have both taken their toll, but if what you want is true success and wellbeing for your people, you must centralize. Autocracy is the way.
I see that the culture of my nation has become very popular in your country. Hopefully you get what's the actual meaning of the word compañero now!
